analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol:
	Contract Tangent has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#132-133)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in CoinSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#226-230):
	External calls:
	- tokenContract.transferFrom(tokenOwner,msg.sender,tangles) (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#228-230)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiPerTangent (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol)

CoinSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#226-230) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transferFrom(tokenOwner,msg.sender,tangles) (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#228-230)

	- tokenOwner = tokenContract.owner() (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#201-202)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in CoinSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#226-230):
	External calls:
	- tokenContract.transferFrom(tokenOwner,msg.sender,tangles) (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#228-230)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numberPurchased (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/38/0x43b4d9e3a82a443e4bfb25470e1dcd12d6853f0b.sol#57-58) is not in mixedCase
